CustomField.description: Overrides the stage condition that is used to query for pledges/gifts. Default is 'Active', 'Confirmed', 'Paid' and 'Funded'. Format is ["Funded","Active"].
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Overrides the stage condition that is used to query for pledges/gifts. Default is 'Active' and 'Confirmed'. Format is ["Funded","Active"].
CustomField.label: Pledge/Gift Stage Query Override
